channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Senior judge blasts court for 'pernicious ... misbehavior' in striking down Texas congressional map
item.description: Senior Circuit Judge Jerry Smith delivered a scorching takedown of a fellow federal judge on Wednesday, accusing his colleague of "unrestrained ideolo...

item.title: Why the Witkoff Plan for Peace Is Simply a Nonstarter for Ukrainians
item.description: The scheme would remove the tools that Ukraine needs to defend itself from subsequent Russian aggression.

item.title: Democrats’ Embrace Of Violent Rhetoric Will Mark Congressional Midterms
item.description: The violent rhetoric isn’t isolated, it’s becoming a feature of Democratic primaries as the party take a harder turn left.

item.title: Shapiro responds to illegal immigrant trucker fiasco – says driver was in fed database first
item.description: Gov. Shapiro clashes with DHS over Uzbek immigrant's Pennsylvania commercial license as officials trade blame over vetting process failures.

item.title: ‘Most Blatant Exercise Of Judicial Activism’: Federal Judge Rips 2-1 Ruling Striking Down TX Congressional Map
item.description: Smith called the majority's ruling the "most blatant exercise of judicial activism" that he has "ever witnessed."

item.title: Grade Inflation Is Deflating the Workforce
item.description: If colleges keep handing out meaningless grades, more testing could provide a better measure of what students have learned.

item.title: Now Is the Moment to Deregulate Obamacare
item.description: The window Republicans have won’t reappear anytime soon.

item.title: The OBBBA has a significant tax change for founders tucked away inside, lifting the cap to $75 million with many opportunities to turbo-charge business
item.description: The QSBS reforms in the OBBBA are more than just tax tweaks—they’re a strategic invitation to growth, raising capital and exiting.

item.description: The U.S. housing market is currently experiencing historic stagnation.

item.title: Democrat Congresswoman Indicted For Using FEMA Funds To Bankroll Her Campaign
item.description: Voters so far have been undeterred by her alleged crimes; the House Ethics Committee began investigating her in 2023.

item.title: Christians Should Defend the Jewish People
item.description: In these times, those who claim the faith would be wise to point young men and women to the firm path of real Christianity.

item.title: Reagan-appointed judge torches colleagues in Texas map fight, calls ruling ‘fiction,’ ‘judicial activism’
item.description: Circuit Court Judge Jerry Smith wrote a fiery 104-page dissent attacking colleague Judge Jeffrey Brown's decision to block Texas redistricting maps.

item.description: More mush from the wimps. Donald Trump is very bad, because mumble mumble mumble.

item.description: Reporting on the Russia Collusion hoax is part of The Federalist's years-long national security investigation.

item.description: The U.S.-Saudi relationship is in a better place, even if it would behoove Trump to curb his enthusiasm.
